document_data.caption: A map showing the Winterglen on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Winterglen
document_data.mainbody: The '''Winterglen''' was a large forest located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Winterglen dominated the northeast corner of Gwynneth, covering approximately {{SI|3000|sq mi|k|long=yes}} of the island. The forest was bordered by the [[Strait of Oman]] and [[Sea of Moonshae]] to the north, and by the [[Strait of Alaron]] to the east. Much of the Winterglen's southern border was framed by the [[Black Mountains]] and [[Cambro Mountains]]. The [[Firloch]] was located near the center of the forest.
document_data.Notable Locations: A pair of [[Moonwell]]s were found in the Winterlgen.
